fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Increasing forgetfulness and difficulty with daily tasks.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Disorientation in time and place; impaired short-term memory.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Nystagmus, intention tremor, dysarthria, abnormal gait.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Normal examination between seizures; may have post-ictal confusion.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Seizure control, adjust therapy as needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sudden onset of weakness on one side of the body.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Facial droop, arm drift, speech difficulties.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Frequent severe headaches accompanied by nausea and sensitivity to light.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Photophobia, phono-phobia, no neurological deficits observed.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Gradual onset of numbness and tingling in the feet or hands.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Decreased sensation to light touch and pinprick in a glove and stocking distribution.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor symptoms, adjust medications as needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Long-term movement disorders and muscle stiffness appearing in early childhood.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Spasticity, abnormal reflexes, and involuntary motions.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Muscular dystrophy, early onset Parkinsons disease
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Persistent headaches, blurred vision, and loss of balance.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Papilloedema observed on fundoscopy, focal neurological deficits depending on tumour location.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: MRI for diagnosis, referral to neurosurgery
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Muscle weakness that worsens after periods of activity and improves after rest.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Variable muscle strength, particularly in ocular and facial muscles; improvement with rest.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Muscle atrophy, fasciculations, and spasticity noted without sensory loss.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Multidisciplinary approach, regular follow-up for symptom management
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Rapid onset of muscle weakness and paralysis starting from the feet and moving upwards.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Symmetrical weakness with diminished reflexes, possible facial paralysis.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor respiratory function, physical therapy for muscle strength
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Involuntary jerking or writhing movements (chorea), and muscle problems.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Chorea, dystonia, impaired gait, and coordination.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Genetic counselling, manage symptoms and psychiatric care
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Sudden weakness or paralysis on one side of the face.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Facial droop, difficulty closing eye on one side.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Unilateral facial weakness, loss of forehead wrinkling, inability to fully close the eyelid.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Corticosteroids, eye care for incomplete eyelid closure
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Physical therapy for facial muscles, protect the eye
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Seizures with sensory disturbances, often starting with a feeling of déjà vu or fear.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Normal examination between seizures; may have post-ictal confusion or fatigue.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Other focal epilepsies, psychogenic non-epileptic seizures
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Anti-epileptic drugs, possible surgery for refractory cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring, evaluate for surgical candidacy
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Complaints of hand tremors and stiffness.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Resting tremor, bradykinesia, muscle stiffness, shuffling gait.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Adjust medication as needed, regular follow-ups
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Nystagmus, intention tremor, dysarthria, abnormal gait.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.defaultValue: Normal examination between seizures; may have post-ictal confusion.

fields.defaultValue: Seizure control, adjust therapy as needed
